snippet: A lawyer for James Risen, a reporter for The New York Times, has asked Attorney General Eric H. Holder Jr. to withdraw a subpoena requiring him to testify about a confidential source.
abstract: Lawyer for New York Times reporter James Risen asks Atty Gen Eric H Holder Jr to withdraw subpoena requiring him to testify about a confidential source, in light of new Justice Dept guidelines for obtaining information from journalists in investigations.
lead_paragraph: A lawyer for James Risen, a reporter for The New York Times, has asked Attorney General Eric H. Holder Jr. to withdraw a subpoena requiring him to testify about a confidential source.
